      • buildInvertedIndex

        public void buildInvertedIndex​(java.lang.String inputDirectory,
                               java.lang.String outputDirectory)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Building of the inverted index. Used to build the mapRaf.raf, dict.raf, and post.raf
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - Directory of pre-processed tokens
        outputDirectory - Directory to store generated .temp files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Handles any IO errors that may occur
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Handles any file and directory issues Time Complexity: O(Dlg(D^2*d^3)) Space Complexity: O(V^2*log(D))

      • countExists

        public int countExists​(java.io.File[] arr)
        Counts the amount of existing files left
        Parameters:
        arr - File[] to count
        Returns:
        Number of existing files Time Complexity: O(D) Space Complexity: O(D)

      • fileExistsArr

        public java.io.File[] fileExistsArr​(java.io.File[] arr)
        Creates a new File[] to accommodate for deleted files
        Parameters:
        arr - File[] to be processed for nonexisting files
        Returns:
        New File[] that has all files that exists Time Complexity: O(D) Space Complexity: O(D^2)

      • idf

        public float idf​(int totalDocs,
                 int count)
        Helper method to calculate Inverse Document Frequency
        Parameters:
        totalDocs - Total number of documents in directory
        count - Total occurrences of a specified word
        Returns:
        IDF value Time Complexity: O(1) Space Complexity: O(1)

      • writeDictRaf

        public void writeDictRaf​(UAInvertedIndex.GlobalWord[] globalTable)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method to write the global hash table into the dict.raf file
        Parameters:
        globalTable - Global hash table to be written to file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Handles any IO errors that the RandomAccessFile may generate Time Complexity: O(V) Space Complexity: O(V)

      • writePostingRaf

        public void writePostingRaf​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​UAInvertedIndex.GlobalWord> index,
                            java.io.File[] files,
                            UAInvertedIndex.GlobalHashTable globalHashTable)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Function to write the postings list to the post.raf file
        Parameters:
        index - HashMap of String, GlobalWord for easy retrieval
        files - File[] of all files in directory
        globalHashTable - Global hash table
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Handles any IO errors during writing to the post.raf file Time Complexity: O(D^3) Space Complexity: O(V^2D^3)
